revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 67:;Teos, son of Petheus, grandson of Teos, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 32;;Sambas, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Sambas, mother Taeuhemeros, copper tetradrachmas 4;;Heras, son of Melanas, grandson of Petheus, mother Tamystha, copper tetradrachmas 4;;Aphrodisios, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetesouchos, drachmas 4;;Perigenes, son of Zoilos, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Sambathion, drachmas 4;;Petsiris, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Petsiris, mother Heros, drachmas 4;;Kastor, son of Marres, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Nikephoros, slave of Longinus Isidoros, drachmas 4;;Heron, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drchmas 108 obols 24;;(Pachon) 25:;Pnepheros, son of Besis, grandson of Thoteus, mother Heras, drachmas 4;;Besis, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Euhemeros, son of Neilos, grandson of Euhemeros, mother Taeuhemeros, drachmas 4 obols 27;;Neilos, his son, mother Sambous, drachmas 4 obols 27;;Keras, son of Nekpheraus (Thaoues);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 5 obol 1, tax on the produce of olives obols 4.5, naubion obols 3 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1 obols 2 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 3) eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2, kollybos obol 1.5, in total drachmas 11 obols 5 chalki 2;;Pnepheros, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Kames, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkonnos, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Pasoknopaios, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 140 obols 28;;(Pachon) 26 likewise:;Kanis, son of Anchophis, grandson of Marres, mother Taorsoraipis, drachmas 4;;Sabinos, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Onnophris, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetsookis, copper tetradrachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Satabous, grandson of Horos, mother Theonis, drachmas 4;;Pakysis, son of Panesneus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Dionysios, fatherless, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 28.;(Pachon) 27 likewise:;Pasoxis, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Panther, mother Taseus, drachmas 4;;Panesneus, son of Ischyras, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Ischyras, his son, mother Tamystha, obols 28."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- CPJ 3, 492 (lines with Sambathion) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
